alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Caribou Range; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 5:03PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorm near Oneida Narrows moving east-southeast toward Paris through 600 PM MDT... At 500 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm near Oneida Narrows Reservoir, moving east-southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 35 mph, moderate rain, and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Preston, Montpelier, Bear Lake Idaho Portion, Saint Charles, Oneida Narrows Reservoir, Dingle, Paris, Bloomington, Bern, Minnetonka Cave, Ovid, Mapleton, Fish Haven, Liberty, Mink Creek, Whitney and Riverdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If recreating on or near Bear Lake, be prepared to seek shelter.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Caribou Range; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region
